mapper.select: SELECT R.RSVT_NO, R.INSP_CD, R.DTL_INSP_CD, D.DTL_INSP_NM, INSP_RSLT, I.OCS_DIV_CD, I.RSLT_DEPT_CD, D.REF_LOW_FIG, D.REF_HIGH_FIG, D.UNIT FROM SC_INSP_RSLT R, SC_INSP I, SC_DTL_INSP D WHERE R.INSP_CD = I.INSP_CD AND R.DTL_INSP_CD = D.DTL_INSP_CD AND R.INSP_CD = D.INSP_CD AND R.RSVT_NO = #{rsvtNo}
